participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Jessica enjoys engaging in crafts and taking care of her pets.
participant_1.background: I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow. I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family. I used to be in the marines. I love animals. I was born completely deaf.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Energetic and resourceful, Michael enjoys cooking and playing sports in his free time.
participant_2.background: My favorite place to eat is at home because I can control the ingredients and create my own unique recipes. I thought of joining the military when I was younger. I am an accountant. I love to play tennis. I have 10 alpacas.

content.text: Hi how are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am about to go home and make dinner. What about you?
I am doing well too, just got home from a walk with my cat Cow.
I love cats! I have 10 alpacas and they are my best friends.
Wow! Alpacas are so cute! I never seen one in person.
They are really friendly animals and they are great for wool.
I love wool! I knit a lot and use wool yarn.
That's awesome! I love knitting too! What kind of things do you like to knit?
I knit hats, scarves, and mittens mostly. I make a lot of gifts for my family and friends.
That's so thoughtful! I love making gifts too. I make a lot of alpaca wool sweaters for my family and friends.
That's amazing! I bet they love them.
They do! They always say how soft and warm they are.
I bet! I love the feel of alpaca wool.
